org.opennars.gui.input

Interface TextInputPanel.TextInputMode

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextInputPanel.NarseseInput, TextInputPanel.NullInput
    Enclosing class:
    TextInputPanel

    public static interface TextInputPanel.TextInputMode
    each InputMode consists of: Interpretation - attempts to describe its interpretation (or lack of) of what is currently entered Actions - possible actions the current input enables, each with description. more than one may be invoked (checkboxes) Completions - descriptions of possible ways to complete the current input, and their meaning
